description:
Prevention is always your first and best defence against a bear attack. This little bell gives bears a chance to hear you coming, and to avoid you if they wish. Its metallic ring, a sound not found in nature, may cause bears to amble away rather than investigate.

  • Strap with hook-and-loop attachment fixes easily to packs, clothing, poles, etc
  • Comes in a variety of colours, and you won't be able to choose. Life is so uncertain
name: Kodiak Bear Bell
